GLOBAL.SPARK_TOKEN_MISSING:
Could not start as bots require a Cisco Spark API access token.
Please add env variable SPARK_TOKEN on the command line or to the .env file
Example: 
> SPARK_TOKEN=XXXXXXXXXXXX PUBLIC_URL=YYYYYYYYYYYYY node bot.js
GLOBAL.PUBLIC_URL_MISSING:
Could not start as this bot must expose a public endpoint.
Please add env variable PUBLIC_URL on the command line or to the .env file
Example: 
> SPARK_TOKEN=XXXXXXXXXXXX PUBLIC_URL=YYYYYYYYYYYYY node bot.js
